Third layer.gif) ::: ::: {.callout title="Reading list"} - Ch70 Intrinsic muscles of the foot @donnellyTravellSimonsSimons2019 - Neuman @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017 ::: # Overview ::: {#tbl-oian .cell message='false' execution_count=1} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ```{=html}
Muscle Origin Insertion Innervation Action
Lumbricals (Foot) FDL tendons (medial borders) 2-5th toes at dorsal aponeurosis Medial Plantar n.
Lateral Plantar n.
S2 - S3		 2nd-5th Toes: MTP Flexion, PIP Extension, DIP Extension
``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} Medial borders of tendons of [FDL]({{< var ref-flexor-digitorum-longus.path >}}) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Dorsal aponeurosis of toes 2-5 @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} - **1st lumbrical (2nd toe)**: [Medial Plantar N.]({{< var ref-medial-plantar-nerve.path >}}) ([S2]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s2 >}}), [S3]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s3 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **2-4 Lumbricals (3rd-5th toes)**: [Lateral Plantar N.]({{< var ref-lateral-plantar-nerve.path >}}) ([S2]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s2 >}}), [S3]({{< var ref-nerve-root.s3 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **MTP 2-5**: Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **IP 2-5**: Extension @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **Toes 2-5**: Adducts toes 2-5 towards big toe @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # MMT
